I like to watch astronomy documentaries and read about space.
My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job.

content.text: Hey I just docked my boat after a long journey around the world!
That is so cool! What do you do for a living?
I am a barista. I love it!
That is so interesting! What do you like about it?
I love making people happy with their coffee. I also love the atmosphere of the coffee shop. It is so relaxing.
That's so cool! I love coffee too.
Oh nice! What is your favorite kind of coffee?
I like iced coffee. It's so refreshing.
Me too! I also love the smell of coffee in the morning.
Me too! It's such a great way to start the day.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to hike and stay fit. I also like to watch astronomy documentaries.
That's so cool! I love hiking too. I have always been interested in space and astronomy.
Me too! I think it is so fascinating.
I have a boat, so I like to go boating and explore the great outdoors.
That is so cool! I would love to go boating sometime.
I would love to show you around.
That would be awesome! I would love to see the world from a boat.
I can do that! I love showing people around the world.
That is so nice of you! I would really appreciate that.
You are welcome! It would be my pleasure.
